title: Why no refunds for runes?
body: Made a mistake on buying too much of the same runes!

replies.body: lol i just did the same thing. i bought a 3rd scaling cdr quint AND IM BORED WITH IT ALREADY. HMMPHH. but srsly i wanna refund at least 1000ip runes. even just being able to do it 3 times.
Because there are only 3 refunds on anything.
